title: Consumable ammunition
body:
Came up with an idea with a few mates the other day, thought the concept might actually be worth sharing.

Now that mages are going bot lane, with this recent fad of "AP ADC" this could be a way for Riot to combat that, if it is indeed a meta shift they do not want.

To the point. the idea is for marksmen exclusive, consumable items to be added to the store. Once bought, they would be added to an ammunition pouch that would be exclusive to marksmen. The marksman would purchase x amount of ammo, store it in this pouch, and toggle the ammunition on and off as they needed.

Class exclusive content is probably a bad way to balance the game, but the concept just feels like it could have so much potential.

Buyable ammo would be more of a late game thing, as purchasing the items would take away from your build paths. With that said, it could be cool to include different tiers of this ammo, for different prices. 


An example;

Tier 1 (Laning phase, used for trading.)
50g per projectile;
+10% life steal

Tier 2 (Mid game, to help you make clutch af plays)
150g per projectile;
+30% crit chance

Tier 3 (late game, after you achieve full build)
1000g Per projectile
Applies a 1 second silence to the target, target can only be silenced by this ammunition once every 10 seconds.


Had a few more ideas but I didn't want this post to get overlong. I would love to hear peoples opinions on this, good and bad. Maybe even your own ideas for ammunition?

replies.body: Interesting concept but the problem is many players would prefer to build items that are permenant such as bloodthirster and it would most likely only be use after full build such as stat increasing potions
